# `vtm.bin`

The CSR matrix used as an example on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sparse_matrix)

$$
\begin{pmatrix}
10 & 20 &  0 &  0 &  0 &  0 \\\\
 0 & 30 &  0 & 40 &  0 &  0 \\\\
 0 &  0 & 50 & 60 & 70 &  0 \\\\
 0 &  0 &  0 &  0 &  0 & 80 \\\\
\end{pmatrix}
$$

# `vol.bin`

$$
\begin{pmatrix}
0.0 \\
0.7 \\
10.0 \\
0.0 \\
0.0 \\
0.25 \\
\end{pmatrix}
$$
